name: Fire Camp
description:
"Fire Camp" is a jam game produced for Ludum Dare 46, with the theme being "Keep it alive".

In our game, you play a lumberjack lost in a fairy forest. Your only way to survive is to keep your camp fire alive. But be aware! Ghosts won't let you alone and will try to extinguish it.
Pick up logs, find axes to cut trees and add combustible inside your camp fire. Don't forget to push ghosts away by crossing them.

When you launch the game, you appear in front of your camp fire. You have to pick up logs or use axes, which can be found in different places, to chop trees. Throw logs in your fire before it gets extinguished. You have a limited amount of combustible you can carry and logs obtained by cutting down a tree that make you go over your maximum capacity will be lost, so don't forget to commute to your camp fire.
There are ghosts trying to extinguish the fire. Walk across them to make them disappear.
Your goal is to survive as long as possible. After a game you earn points (money) than you can spend to improve your skills.
